prompts.name: assemble_context
prompts.description: Build operator context for a decision type, including DTE constraints, policy rules, and recent episodes.

arguments.name: decision_type
arguments.description: The decision type to assemble context for.

prompts.name: trace_decision
prompts.description: Trace the full decision chain for a sealed episode: actions taken, verification results, degrade path, and drift signals.

prompts.name: check_contradictions
prompts.description: Identify drift contradictions for an episode by comparing its truth claims against the memory graph canon.

arguments.name: episode_id
arguments.description: The episode ID to check for contradictions.
